description: Starts a session for a specified Dev Environment.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.

parameters.name: sessionConfiguration
parameters.description: Information about the configuration of a Dev Environment session. The type of the session. executeCommandSessionConfiguration (dict) --- Information about optional commands that will be run on the Dev Environment when the SSH session begins. The command used at the beginning of the SSH session to a Dev Environment. arguments (list) --- An array of arguments containing arguments and members. (string) ---

nested_params.name: executeCommandSessionConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about optional commands that will be run on the Dev Environment when the SSH session begins.

nested_params.name: command
nested_params.description: The command used at the beginning of the SSH session to a Dev Environment.

nested_params.name: arguments
nested_params.description: An array of arguments containing arguments and members.

nested_items.name: accessDetails
nested_items.description: Information about connection details for a Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: streamUrl
nested_items.description: The URL used to send commands to and from the Dev Environment.

nested_items.name: tokenValue
nested_items.description: An encrypted token value that contains session and caller information used to authenticate the connection.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment session.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The system-generated unique ID of the Dev Environment.
